sentences.sContent: The document was compiled by the Department of Health.
sentences.sCn: 这份文件是由卫生部汇编的。

synos.tran: 编译；编制；编辑；[图情]汇编

remMethod.val: com(一起) + pile(堆) → 堆在一起 → 汇集

words.tran: 编译器；[计] 编译程序；编辑者，汇编者

trans.tranCn: 编译, 编辑, 汇编
trans.tranOther: to make a book, list, record etc, using different pieces of information, music etc
